adDetails: OPENINGS TODAY We are here to provide Professional moving services for You. Our goal is to to help each individual or family experience a safe and healthy moving experience.We want to offer the most professional service and help with your every command We Specialize in Loading or Unloading your: Rental Truck, ABF Trailer, P.O.D.or vehicle (any size) Prices for Moving Helpers: 1 Mover $30.00hr (customer supplies truck) 2 Movers $55.00hr 3 Movers $85.00hr *Time starts when the movers arrive at your place *Time ends when you are completely satisfied & the move is done **No hidden charges; Highly Trained Very Experienced Professional Movers with courteous service **Safe secure handling of your belongings **We provide all moving equipment for the move **Services also provided for piano,spa and pool table moves Excellent references available upon request Thank you for visiting us, Call for moving help/moving options show contact info
